statements: SELECT * FROM toll_collection WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, collection_date, toll_amount FROM toll_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, toll_amount FROM toll_collection WHERE toll_amount > 10;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(toll_amount) AS total_amount FROM toll_collection GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC, vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(toll_amount) as total_amount FROM toll_collection GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(toll_amount) as avg_amount FROM toll_collection GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING avg_amount > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_collections FROM toll_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT vehicle_id, toll_amount, collection_date FROM toll_collection WHERE toll_amount > 20 ORDER BY toll_amount DESC, vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection
SELECT transaction_id, vehicle_number, collected_amount FROM toll_collection WHERE collected_amount > 100
SELECT vehicle_number, collection_time FROM toll_collection ORDER BY collection_time DESC
SELECT * FROM revenue_generation WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT toll_plaza_id, SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_generation GROUP BY toll_plaza_id
SELECT * FROM toll_collection WHERE collected_amount > 50 ORDER BY collection_time DESC
SELECT vehicle_number, collected_amount FROM toll_collection WHERE toll_plaza_id = 3
SELECT SUM(collected_amount) AS total_collected_amount FROM toll_collection
SELECT vehicle_number, collection_time FROM toll_collection WHERE collected_amount BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY collection_time ASC
SELECT vehicle_number, total_revenue FROM toll_collection tc INNER JOIN revenue_generation rg ON tc.toll_plaza_id = rg.toll_plaza_id WHERE tc.collected_amount > rg.total_revenue
SELECT * FROM toll_booths;
SELECT booth_name, location FROM toll_booths WHERE booth_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_number, amount FROM toll_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT booth_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM toll_transactions NATURAL JOIN toll_booths GROUP BY booth_name;
SELECT date, total_revenue FROM revenue_report WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT booth_id, booth_name, location FROM toll_booths WHERE booth_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM toll_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT booth_name, location, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM toll_booths JOIN toll_transactions ON toll_booths.booth_id = toll_transactions.booth_id GROUP BY booth_name, location;
SELECT date, SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_report WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY date;
SELECT vehicle_number, amount, timestamp FROM toll_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM toll_booths;
SELECT booth_id, toll_amount, location FROM toll_booths ORDER BY booth_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, owner_name, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM toll_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_revenue, month FROM revenue GROUP BY month;
SELECT * FROM toll_booths;
SELECT location, booth_id FROM toll_booths ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, owner_name, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT DISTINCT month FROM revenue ORDER BY month;

SELECT booth_id, location, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_revenue FROM toll_booths JOIN toll_transactions ON toll_booths.booth_id = toll_transactions.booth_id GROUP BY booth_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM toll_booths;
SELECT vehicle_id, plate_number, make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT revenue_id, total_amount, month, year FROM revenue ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT authority_id, name, phone_number FROM toll_authorities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM toll_transactions WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM toll_booths WHERE type = 'Express';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM toll_booths GROUP BY location;
SELECT plate_number, make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_revenue, month, year FROM toll_transactions GROUP BY month, year ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM toll_authorities WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name;
